class pyper.modules.system.system.System(section: str)¶

Base system class.

add_stage()¶

Add an empty stage.

add_task(func: Callable, args: List[Any], nprocs: int)¶

Add a task to current stage.

Parameters

  • {Callable} -- function called in the task (func) –

  • {List[Any]} -- arguments of the function (args) –

  • {int} -- number of processors for the task (nprocs) –

mpirun(tasks: Union[List[Tuple[str, str, int]], Tuple[str, str, int]]) → int¶

Run mpi tasks.

Parameters

{Union[List[Tuple[str, str, int]], Tuple[str, str, int]]} -- path, command and number of processors (tasks) –

Returns

int – exit code of the system call

Raises

NotImplementedError – abstract method defined by child class

pipe(add_stage: bool, nprocs: int)¶

Return a decorator that makes a function to create task.

Parameters

  • {bool} -- whether the task should be executed in a new stage (add_stage) –

  • {int} -- number of processors (nprocs) –

Returns

Callable – decorator of functions
